message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

The paper deals with cross-lingual information retrieval, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of embeddings, which falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (Learning). The paper also proposes a new method for cross-lingual information retrieval, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on standard datasets, which involves multimedia data, making cs.MM (Multimedia) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with information retrieval, which is a subfield of databases, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) another possible sub-category.
